name: Shackles Garrison Mobile theory
desc:
From personnel training to the systems within the ship, extensive and personalized modifications have been made. Incorporating the engine control system developed by the Shackles Garrison, this ship further emphasizes the mobile combat doctrine style of Shackles Garrison as a whole.

Based on ship class:
Increase the zero-flux top speed of ships %s/%s/%s/%s, while also enhancing the missile guidance capability by %s ;

Within the first %s of the ship's peak cr duration:
Depending on the ship class, zero-flux acceleration can be triggered when the flux level is below %s/%s/%s/%s.

desc: This plugin is built-in to all Shackles Garrison carriers

desc:
A type of Omega that is fleeing from an destructive encounter with the fringe tactical fleet of the Shackle Garrison.

What? You wonder about that little guy next to this paragraph?

That is miga, he is a Miga Enginer, he made all of those coooool omega you never seen before to havin fun.
Say hello to little miga!
                     - Yisic

name: Modular Quenching Core
desc:
This ship is a specialized frigate-class combat vessel of the 27th Battle Group, with its specialized internal weapon modules can support certain exclusive weapons. The system of this ship has been tuned to a certain extent, and pushing it further may require additional costs.

When equipped with %s/%s, it will further reduce the ship's peak cr time.

When equipped with %s, the ship will additionally lose %s armor and structure; at the same time, it will also increase the damage of  energy weapons/ballistic weapons/missile weapons by %s.

When equipped with %s, the engine will take an additional %s damage, while increasing the maximum speed by %s.

This ship can be salvaged under any non-fatal injuries.

desc:

When the ship's flux exceeds half of its max capacity, the top speed of the ship is increased by up to %s , increasing with current flux level.
